title: Acting Director of DAF CLOUDworks
actions: During the government shutdown, all civilians, including our Director, were furloughed. As the ranking military member, I assumed leadership of all DAF CLOUDworks, the Department of the Air Force's premier cloud broker program office.
impact: DAF CLOUDworks continued to run without any service interruptions. After the government shutdown ended, ABMS asked us what failed, what we had to cut back due to limited funding, and we didn't have to due to our pre-planning and execution for the prolonged shutdown. We did not fail.
notes: I became the primary POC for both HAF AF/A2 (all AF ISR) and ABMS.
activeBullet: - Led DAF CLOUDworks through gov't shutdown; executed emergency operations and funding plan-zero program interruptions; managed $101.9M portfolio/324 personnel/188 mission partners; primary POC to HAF/A2 and ABMS.

title: DAF CLOUDworks Azure - Speed
actions: Designed, built, and accredited the DAF CLOUDworks enterprise Azure cloud across Unclassified, SIPR, and JWICS networks from the ground up; led the end-to-end architecture, security design, accreditation strategy, and execution, achieving full three-year ATO in 8 months and complete operational delivery in one year—the fastest enterprise IC cloud accreditation on record.
impact: Delivered the Air Force Intelligence Community’s first inheritable, continuously monitored Azure ATO, allowing mission partners to deploy instant compliant landing zones and eliminate 6–18 months of independent ATO delays. Enabled architectural freedom for mission teams under pre-configured AF IC cybersecurity guardrails, radically accelerating warfighter speed, cloud adoption, and operational scaling.
metrics: •	$8.742M/year Azure engineering labor (30 FTE contractors) 	•	$844K/year Azure hub cloud infrastructure 	•	3 security domains: Unclassified, SIPR, JWICS 	•	Founding stakeholders: Space Force, CENTCOM 	•	Mission partners: SOCOM, AFOTEC, ACC A3/2D 	•	Industry partner: Microsoft Azure 	•	ATO timeline: 8 months (record), 3-year duration 	•	Program Status: Fully transitioned to DAF CLOUDworks Program of Record 	•	Operational: Yes (active production use)
notes: This was the first instance of a single, enterprise-scale, inheritable Azure ATO in the Air Force IC with continuous monitoring enabled at Day 1. Built without central funding—entirely sustained through external customer investment. The solution permanently removed ATO as the pacing item for classified cloud onboarding and enabled mission-driven, not architecture-restricted, development.
activeBullet: - Led end-to-end design, security architecture, and accreditation of DAF CLOUDworks’ first enterprise Azure cloud across Unclassified/SIPR/JWICS—secured full 3-year ATO in 8 months, fastest IC cloud accreditation

title: Azure Single-ATO
activeBullet: - Pioneered the Azure single‑ATO; the warfighter inherits full cyber compliance with continuous monitoring on day-1; removed 6–18‑month mission‑partner ATO waits; unlocked instant cloud compliance and usage for operational users.

title: Azure Customer Funds
activeBullet: Directed customer-funded execution model in the absence of central funding—secured and managed $9.6M/year in combined labor and cloud investment to sustain zero-fail enterprise operations for Space Force and CENTCOM

title: 92d COS
activeBullet: - Directed DAF CLOUDworks’ response to high-visibility 92d COS cybersecurity investigation; no compromise or vulnerabilities of $101.9M systems portfolio found, earned external validation for mature enterprise cloud defenses.

title: HASC Request
actions: Completed House Armed Service Committee request for Lt Col Nichols at HAF AF/A2
activeBullet: - Led HAF AF/A2 response to HASC RFI—corrected JWCC/C2E assumptions; delivered clear IC cloud usage, funding, and manpower data; enabled accurate oversight and protected DAF/IC credibility.

title: AFSOC IP Outage
activeBullet: - Oversaw enterprise cloud outage AAR after mission-partner disruption; drove root-cause discovery, emergency cloud re-architecture, and full stakeholder transparency, permanently eliminating hard failure mode and elevating IC cloud operational maturity
